tooltip.label: Creates a Holy Lightwell.  Friendly players can click the Lightwell to restore (267 * 3 *) health over 6 sec.  Attacks done to you equal to 30% of your total health will cancel the effect. Lightwell lasts for 3 min or 10 charges.
